bibl.title: A Coptic Funerary Relief with Interesting Name, in the Collections of the British Museum.
bibl.note: British Museum, Inv. 69032 (formerly in the Victoria & Albert Museum, Inv. 144-1896). Stela of Herakleitos, λαμπρότατος. Provenance unknown, beginning of the 4th - first decades of the 5th century.
bibl.seg: PELSMAEKERS Johnny, A Coptic Funerary Relief with Interesting Name, in the Collections of the British Museum.
British Museum, Inv. 69032 (formerly in the Victoria & Albert Museum, Inv. 144-1896). Stela of Herakleitos, λαμπρότατος. Provenance unknown, beginning of the 4th - first decades of the 5th century.
